name: coinglass-monitor
description: CoinGlass 利率监控提醒系统 - Windows 本地部署版本

scripts.setup: node -e "import('fs').then(fs => {import('path').then(path => {const projectRoot = '.'; const directories = ['data', 'data/email-history', 'data/scrape-history', 'data/backups']; directories.forEach(dir => {const dirPath = path.join(projectRoot, dir); fs.mkdirSync(dirPath, { recursive: true });}); const envPath = path.join(projectRoot, '.env'); if (!fs.existsSync(envPath)) { const examplePath = path.join(projectRoot, '.env.example'); if (fs.existsSync(examplePath)) { fs.copyFileSync(examplePath, envPath); } } console.log('✅ 环境配置完成');});}).catch(console.error);"
